snippet.title: The War of the Worlds: Siberia — Official Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
1C Game Studios presents The War of the Worlds: Siberia — a new action/adventure game.

In an alternate 1896, Earth was the target of a massive Martian invasion.
The War of the Worlds: Siberia takes place in Russia, where several characters attempt to save themselves by fleeing panic-stricken Petrograd and head for the eastern end of the Russian Empire.

Currently, the project is under development, the release date will be announced later.

We are looking for artists, programmers, animators, and mission designers!
http://siberiawotw.com
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us on our social media channels:
1CGS on VK https://vk.com/1cgamestudios
1CGS on Telegram https://t.me/gamestudios1c

Jobs at 1C Game Studios: https://1cgs.net/jobs and http://siberiawotw.com
 
#1cgamestudios #1cgs #gamedev #wotw #waroftheworldsiberia
